header.title: Complex business solutions
header.text: Solar energy is an alternative source of energy supply, ensuring a stable power supply to your home and a significant reduction in energy costs.

features.title: Benefits of using
features.text: Solix offers a turnkey installation of solar power plants for businesses for their own consumption. Business owners are faced with the problem of constant growth of tariffs for legal entities. A solar power panel means energy independence for business entities and the formation of a positive image of an innovative, socially responsible company in the eyes of society and potential customers. Installing your own solar power plant, you can quickly and easily increase the supplied power at the facility or create a reliable backup of important nodes, the failure of which is unacceptable.

cards.title: Green Energy
cards.text: Solar power is a great way to reduce your carbon footprint. A typical solar panel manufacturing eliminates 11 to 24 tons of carbon emissions per year, which is equivalent to planting more than 600 trees annually.

cards.title: Cost-efficiency
cards.text: Reduce or even eliminate electricity bills. With a solar panel system, you will generate electricity free of charge for the entire 25-year life cycle of your system.

cards.title: Predictable costs
cards.text: By investing in a solar energy system now, you can lock in your electricity tariff and protect yourself from unpredictable increases in costs. Switching to solar energy will also help you better predict and manage your costs.

cards.title: Competitiveness
cards.text: Companies are quickly realizing the economic benefits of using solar energy. Since early adopters are already outstripping the competition, we suggest looking at solar energy as a way to stay competitive.

cards.title: Free of charge
cards.text: Solar energy is a free source of energy, as no one can monopolize sunlight. Your solar energy panel will start saving money from the moment you turn it on.

cards.title: Autonomy and independence
cards.text: Your own solar panel is a guarantee of your peace of mind, independence, and energy security for business and home. You will never again be worried about wind, rain, snow, or broken power lines.

advantages.title: Benefits of placing solar panels on the roof
items: Additional sound insulation and protection of the roof from atmospheric precipitation.

card.name: Less than 0.6 per year solar module degradation

list.text: It is possible to place the solar panel directly on the ground using special support structures. To do this, you need to choose a place where shading from nearby objects will not be created. The installation of support structures on the ground takes place in two stages: first, the foundation is installed, usually of concrete, and only then the installation of the structures themselves is carried out on it.

tabs.title: On-grid
tabs.text: On-grid solar power plant is ideal for powering objects connected to the centralized grid in order to reduce energy costs and increase the supplied power to the grid. The grid-connected solar plant does not have the ability to store electricity and is only able to work in parallel with the grid, due to lack of rechargeable batteries.

tabs.title: Heterojunction
tabs.text: New generation heterostructure modules combine the advantages of thin-film and crystalline technologies. Heterostructure modules convert a wider spectrum of radiation into electricity, which is reflected in a record efficiency - up to 23.5% per cell, 22% per module. It is a highly efficient technology that is in the TOP-5 in terms of efficiency in the world.

tabs.title: Thin-film
tabs.text: Thin-film photovoltaic modules are manufactured using micromorphic thin-film technology, which provides the fastest return on investment: the micromorphic module converts both the visible and infrared spectrum of solar radiation.

items.title: Net accounting
items.text: This mechanism is aimed at end-users. Owners of power plant systems that produce renewable energy for their own needs and who have entered into a contract with the supplier for the supply of electricity at a regulated price will benefit from the net metering mechanism.

items.title: Direct Benefits
items.text: End-users who produce renewable energy for their own use can significantly lower their electricity bills or become supplier independent.
